DOC.brief_summary: Cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) one important frequent cause death . Postprandial lipidemia ( PPL ) independent risk factor CVD , besides traditional risk factor e.g . hypertension , high LDL-cholesterol , family disposition CVD type 2 diabetes ( T2D ) . A high PPL associate increase risk myocardial infarction stroke . Reduction increase PPL , part CVD prevention , therefore pivotal . Especially group increase risk CVD , like metabolic syndrome ( MeS ) T2D . Identification simple diet-related method possibly result reduction CVD healthy well high-risk subject . The aim project investigate effect whey protein consume pre-meal prior fat-rich meal response triglycerides apolipoprotein B48 ( ApoB48 ) subject type 2 diabetes compare healthy subject . Secondarily aim study response glucose , insulin , glucagon , amino acid , inflammatory marker , incretins , rate gastric empty metabolomics . Also satiety feeling measure . Investigators hypothesize whey protein consume 15 minute prior fat-rich isocaloric meal reduces triglyceride- ApoB48 response type 2 diabetic subject compare healthy subject . The investigator research hopefully contribute well understand PPL modify simple manner . It promote innovation food industry development production healthy food product , apply fight CVD background population general high-risk people particular . DOC.brief_title: The Effect Whey Protein Consumed Pre-meal Postprandial Lipemia Healthy Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Using randomise , cross-over design 12 healthy subject 12 subject type 2 diabetes consume test meal prior fat-rich meal . The test meal contain 2 different meal type ; whey protein consume pre-meal another water pre-meal . In second meal type whey protein instead consume part fat-rich meal . Blood sample collect consumption pre-meal consumption fat-rich isocaloric meal 360 minute . The fat-rich isocaloric meal breakfast containing 1043 kcal ( 15 E % protein , 65 E % fat 20 E % carbohydrate ) . The main-meal composed white bread , rye bread , butter , cheese ( 45 % ) , salami , egg , bacon , milk ( 1.5 % fat ) coffee ( decaffeinate ) consume 15 min . Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) use determination subjective satiety feeling .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria general : Weight stable last three month . BMI < 40 Inclusion Criteria subject type 2 diabetes : Diagnosed type 2 diabetes ( HbA1c > 48 mmol/l ) Stable dose Metformin , Sulfonylurea ( SU ) , insulin SGLT inhibitor accept . Exclusion Criteria general : Type 1 diabetes Type 2 diabetes ( HbA1c ≥ 48 mmol/L ) Fasting plasma triglyceride > 5.0 mmol/L Blood pressure > 160/100 mmHg Cardiovascular , liver , kidney metabolic disease Corticosteroid treatment Pregnancy lactation Alcohol drug abuse Legal incapacity Exclusion Criteria subject type 2 diabetes : Treatment DPP4 inhibitor , GLP1 agonists basal bolus insulin . Fasting blood glucose ≥ 14 mmol/l . Exclusion Criteria healthy subject : Prediabetes , define WHO criterion ( IGF ≥ 6.1 mmol/l ) .
